Read and understand clinical health data.
This app reads your health data (e.g. steps) to show activity insights.
This app writes health data you choose (e.g. workouts) to your Health app.
This app uses your location during workouts to map routes.
This app needs photo library access so you can select and upload images.
This app may save images to your photo library when you choose to export or download.
This app uses the camera to capture photos for your profile or logs.
This app may use the microphone when recording audio or video.
This app may access contacts when you choose to invite or share.
This app may access your calendar to create or manage events you request.
This app may access reminders to help manage tasks you request.
This app may use Bluetooth to connect to compatible nearby devices.
This app may use Bluetooth to discover and communicate with compatible devices.
This app uses Face ID for secure authentication if you enable it.
This app may use speech recognition when you choose voice input.
